question: From which nation Brunei gained independence in 1984?
explanation: Brunei was under the control of the Bruneian Empire from the 15th to 19th century. Later, during the 1880s, Brunei became the British Protected State. British residents were appointed in Brunei. Petroleum reserves in Brunei were discovered with the help of the British during the early 1930s. In the 1940s, during World War I, Brunei went into Japanese hands. In 1945, British recaptured Brunei from Japan. In 1959, Brunei was granted self-government rights. In 1984, Brunei was granted independence.
